text: Louis Blériot in his monoplane The Louis Blériot medal is an aviation honor awarded by the Fédération Aéronautique Internationale (FAI), the international aviation record adjudicating body. The medal may be awarded up to three times every year to record setters in speed, altitude and distance categories in light aircraft. The award was established by 1936 in honor of Louis Blériot.FAI Louis Blériot medal winner listing ==Award recipients== *2008 Stéphane Deregnaucour *2007 not awarded *2006 not awarded *2005 Dick Rutan, distance, XCOR EZ-Rocket *2004 Robert L.
